description:
Sora dreams that Prism is attacked by Ranborg. Tortured by her thoughts, Sora tells Mashiro, “I don’t want you to transform into a Precure” and tries to protect Ellee all by herself.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hand in Hand! Our New Attack!
Te to Te o Tsunaide! Watashitachi no Atarashii Waza!
手と手をつないで! 私たちの新しい技!
